mapper.select:
SELECT r.cre_num, r.cre_content, r.mem_num, m.mem_id, r.cre_rdate, r.cre_mdate, r.cre_level, r.cre_ref, re.mem_id parent_id FROM cboard_re r JOIN member m ON r.mem_num = m.mem_num LEFT OUTER JOIN cboard_re p ON r.cre_ref = p.cre_num LEFT OUTER JOIN member re ON p.mem_num = re.mem_num
WHERE r.cre_report < 10
START WITH r.cre_ref = #{cre_num} /*답글에 해당하는 댓글*/ CONNECT BY PRIOR r.cre_num = r.cre_ref
